column4: I want to know if it is worth it to upgrade to Dapper from Badger on my P-IV machine. I put Dapper on my AMD-64 machine and found that some of the applications I need and want are not available for Dapper on ADM-64. For example, Real Player. Will I loose functionality in migrating from Badger to Dapper on my P-IV?
you can use Real media player on amd64 too
but it doesn't work too well
Thanks. What should I used on my AMD-64 instead of RealPlayer?
Real Player itself, hold on for a url
Should I expect Dapper to be better somehow than Badger on my P-IV? In what ways?
Again, many thanks! I owe you a Coke! Best regards, Phil Smith, Duluth, GA
suscribe and stay in touch with UbuntuForums.org
